question_1.question: What should be done if you want to exclude specific accounts from the data extraction in TimeXtender Dynamics 365 Finance data source?

options.option_a: Leave the 'Accounts' box empty and check the 'Include all accounts' checkbox.
options.option_b: Enter the accounts to be excluded in the 'Accounts' box and check the 'Include all accounts' checkbox.
options.option_c: Enter the accounts to be included in the 'Accounts' box and uncheck the 'Include all accounts' checkbox.
options.option_d: Check the 'Include all accounts' checkbox and do not enter any account in the 'Accounts' box.

question_1.explanation: To exclude specific accounts, you should enter the accounts you do not want to extract data from in the 'Accounts' box and check the 'Include all accounts' checkbox. This will include all accounts except for those listed.

question_2.question: Which fields are recommended to be added for Incremental loading when setting up the TimeXtender Dynamics 365 Finance data source?
question_2.explanation: For Incremental loading, it is recommended to add the fields DATAAREAID and MODIFIEDDATETIME, as they contain the account name and a date, which are ideal for tracking changes.
